suite.name: eBox POP/IMAP tests from external
suite.desc: Contains a set of tests to check that the eBox mail module works properly.

test.name: ConfigNetworkSetExternal
test.desc: Sets the interface as external.

test.name: EnableModules
test.desc: Enable network, users and mail modules.

test.name: RemoveGateway
test.desc: Remote the default gateway on the anste's communication interface.

test.name: AddGateway
test.desc: Adds the scenario router as gateway

test.name: ConfigMailAccount
test.desc: Config the mail account.

test.name: AllowMailFromExternal
test.desc: Allow mail access from external clients.

test.name: SetupRouter
test.desc: Setup redirection to eBox machine.

test.name: Test-POP-Disabled

test.name: Test-POP-SSL-Disabled
